blog.name: bloodyshadow1
blog.title: Ethereal Hope
blog.description: I should warn you, I have no idea what I'm doing

summary: While I don’t think Jester taking Nott’s flask was exactly the worse thing to do, I’m glad that Beau gave Nott the remaining sip...
body: While I don’t think Jester taking Nott’s flask was exactly the worse thing to do, I’m glad that Beau gave Nott the remaining sip of her families wine.  Nott doesn’t need alcohol removed from her reach, she needs to talk about it with the people who love her.  Going cold turkey will only cause her to deteriorate for a while until she gets dry, and even then it won’t be like she’s cured, she just doesn’t have access to what she wants and once she gets a chance she’s going to fall back on the wagon.  If they lighten the amount of alcohol that Nott drinks so that she isn’t useless and stops obsessing over her lost flask at least to some degree.  Having someone give her alcohol freely without requesting anything might also do her some good and a bit less paranoid, Maybe.

reblog.comment: While I don’t think Jester taking Nott’s flask was exactly the worse thing to do, I’m glad that Beau gave Nott the remaining sip of her families wine.  Nott doesn’t need alcohol removed from her reach, she needs to talk about it with the people who love her.  Going cold turkey will only cause her to deteriorate for a while until she gets dry, and even then it won’t be like she’s cured, she just doesn’t have access to what she wants and once she gets a chance she’s going to fall back on the wagon.  If they lighten the amount of alcohol that Nott drinks so that she isn’t useless and stops obsessing over her lost flask at least to some degree.  Having someone give her alcohol freely without requesting anything might also do her some good and a bit less paranoid, Maybe.

trail.content_raw: While I don’t think Jester taking Nott’s flask was exactly the worse thing to do, I’m glad that Beau gave Nott the remaining sip of her families wine.  Nott doesn’t need alcohol removed from her reach, she needs to talk about it with the people who love her.  Going cold turkey will only cause her to deteriorate for a while until she gets dry, and even then it won’t be like she’s cured, she just doesn’t have access to what she wants and once she gets a chance she’s going to fall back on the wagon.  If they lighten the amount of alcohol that Nott drinks so that she isn’t useless and stops obsessing over her lost flask at least to some degree.  Having someone give her alcohol freely without requesting anything might also do her some good and a bit less paranoid, Maybe.
trail.content: While I don’t think Jester taking Nott’s flask was exactly the worse thing to do, I’m glad that Beau gave Nott the remaining sip of her families wine.  Nott doesn’t need alcohol removed from her reach, she needs to talk about it with the people who love her.  Going cold turkey will only cause her to deteriorate for a while until she gets dry, and even then it won’t be like she’s cured, she just doesn’t have access to what she wants and once she gets a chance she’s going to fall back on the wagon.  If they lighten the amount of alcohol that Nott drinks so that she isn’t useless and stops obsessing over her lost flask at least to some degree.  Having someone give her alcohol freely without requesting anything might also do her some good and a bit less paranoid, Maybe.

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

summary: I had to pause critical role when it got to the break so I could go get some food and I immediately had to download the Vanessa...
body:
I had to pause critical role when it got to the break so I could go get some food and I immediately had to download the Vanessa Carlton song so I could sing it in the car cause it’s stuck in my head so bad from that first half, thanks critical role

If I could fallllll into the skyyyyy

summary:
Hey guys? Hey? Hey guys?
The Cerberus Assembly is named after Cerberus who, according to Greek myth, guarded the gate to the...
body:
Hey guys? Hey? Hey guys?

The Cerberus Assembly is named after Cerberus who, according to Greek myth, guarded the gate to the underworld/afterlife.

The Kryn Dynasty have a society/religion built around reincarnation and never truly passing on to the afterlife.

I DON’T KNOW WHAT TO DO WITH THIS SUDDEN EPIPHANY. MATTHEW. YOU SLY DOG.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: I wonder how Beau’s family wine tastes in comparison to other wines in the world. Is it really the best wine, or is that just...
body:
I wonder how Beau’s family wine tastes in comparison to other wines in the world. Is it really the best wine, or is that just her assuming or believing her parents lies and theres potentially better wine somewhere else?

What real world comparison could be made as to what the wine tastes like?

reblog.comment:

summary:
Matt: It's going to attack you, Caleb.
Liam, immediately: Hits.
Marisha: I'm never playing a wizard. Never.
[Laura and Taliesin...
body:
Matt: It's going to attack you, Caleb.
Liam, immediately: Hits.
Marisha: I'm never playing a wizard. Never.
[Laura and Taliesin nod in agreement]
Liam: Next five campaigns for me, all barbarians. All barbarians!
